message.content:
cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.FM, cs.SC 

The paper proposes a technique for proving program termination using second-order logic with restricted quantification, which is a topic in logic (cs.LO). The paper also discusses the use of templates, which is a topic in programming languages (cs.PL). The focus on fixed-width machine arithmetic and floating-point arithmetic suggests a connection to software engineering (cs.SE) and formal methods (cs.FM). Finally, the paper deals with finite-state programs, which is a topic in scientific computing (cs.SC).
